message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $10,500.

Thank you for considering my interest in the product. I appreciate the value you're offering, but I believe we can reach a more mutually beneficial agreement. I would like to propose a price of $9,500 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product at $9,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10,250.

I understand Alice's position, and I respect her decision. I would like to continue our negotiation by proposing a price of $9,750 for the product. I hope this proposal aligns better with both our interests.

Thank you for your revised offer, Bob. I'm still not willing to sell the product at $9,750. I'm willing to compromise and offer it to you for $10,500. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your efforts in finding a middle ground, Alice. Considering your last offer and my budget constraints, I would like to propose a final price of $10,000 for the product. I hope this proposal allows us to reach a satisfactory agreement.

I understand that you're trying to find a compromise, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product at $10,000. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $10,250. This is my last offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts in trying to accommodate my budget. Based on our previous discussions and my financial constraints, I would like to propose a final price of $10,000 for the product. I hope this proposal will lead to a successful conclusion of our negotiations.
